title: Open Education Platform for Bangladesh
author: EdTech Volunteers
summary: A free, open-source educational platform with curriculum-aligned content in Bangla, supporting students from primary to higher secondary levels.
problemStatement: Quality education remains inaccessible to millions due to economic constraints, geographic barriers, and shortage of qualified teachers. Private tutoring creates inequality.
proposedSolution: Create a Khan Academy-style platform in Bangla with video lessons, interactive exercises, and progress tracking aligned with the national curriculum.
technicalArchitecture: Content: Video hosting on cost-effective CDN
Database: MongoDB for flexible content structure
expectedImpact: Free quality education for 10+ million students

risks.mitigation: Peer review system and expert validation
Low-spec device optimization, school computer labs
